title: Silver 1 looking for Duo partner !
body:
Hi guy, I'm currently Silver 1, 80 lp and looking for a partner to climb to Gold.
I main MID/SUP, decent in other roles. I ward a lot, average 25+ every game and my MMR is about 1500.
I hope to find someone friendly to have fun with, would be wonderful if you are a bit better than me so I can learn a few things :) 

my IGN is: Juicy Cupcake

replies.body: yeah im plat 2 i added u in game let me know when u are ready

Thanks bro :D, lovely to have you here.
You are plat? wondering if we could duo lol, I have felt the promo to Gold twice @_@
i added you i would be happy to help u climb
